1/* $NetBSD: getportproto.c,v 1.2 2012/07/22 14:27:36 darrenr Exp $ */
2
3/*

5 *

8 * Id: getportproto.c,v 1.1.1.2 2012/07/22 13:44:38 darrenr Exp $
9 */
10
11#include <ctype.h>
12#include "ipf.h"
13
14int getportproto(name, proto)
15 char *name;
16 int proto;
17{
18 struct servent *s;
19 struct protoent *p;
20
21 if (ISDIGIT(*name)) {
22 int number;
23 char *s;
24
25 for (s = name; *s != '\0'; s++)
26 if (!ISDIGIT(*s))
27 return -1;
28
29 number = atoi(name);
30 if (number < 0 || number > 65535)
31 return -1;
32 return htons(number);
33 }
34
35 p = getprotobynumber(proto);
36 s = getservbyname(name, p ? p->p_name : NULL);
37 if (s != NULL)
38 return s->s_port;
39 return -1;
40}
41
